title: Why MVC is Important
contents: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: What is Password Hashing?
contents: Password hashing means passing a plain text password through a hashing algorithm to generate a unique value. The downside of hashing is that it is predictable
